name: Jesse Richards
image: Jesse Richards, photo by Charles Thomson.jpg
caption: Jesse Richards
works: Night Life, Shooting at the Moon
summary: Jesse Richards (born July 17, 1975) is a painter, filmmaker and photographer from New Haven, Connecticut and was affiliated with the international movement Stuckism. He has been described as "one of the most provocative names in American underground culture", and "the father of remodernist cinema".
